section.title: Echo
section.para: The <echo> action prints messages to the console/logger. This functionality is useful when debugging test runs. The property "message" defines the text that is printed. Tester might use it to print out debug messages and variables as shown the next code example:
section.programlisting:
<testcase name="echoTest"> <variables> <variable name="date" value="citrus:currentDate()"/> </variables> <actions> <echo> <message>Hello Test Framework</message> </echo>
<echo> <message>Current date is: ${date}</message> </echo> </actions> </testcase>
Hello Test Framework Current time is: 05.08.2008
